solution_line_template: After Smith gave him ${smith_gave}, Randy had {randy_initial}+{smith_gave}=<<{randy_initial}+{smith_gave}={randy_after_smith}>>{randy_after_smith} dollars.
The value of the rest of the money is {randy_after_smith}-{sally_given}=<<{randy_after_smith}-{sally_given}={rest}>>{rest} dollars.
